nodes.text: Fuz'een was a male Mirialan who served in the Republic Army during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. He was stationed aboard Carrick Station, where he distributed equipment.

Fuz'een appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Level 38 Equipment Commendations Vendor on Carrick Station, though he was later relabeled as a Hoth Equipment Commendations Vendor. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, he was removed from the game along with the rest of the Equipment Commendations Vendors.
